changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE metadata.logical_file ADD COLUMN disk_location text;

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.logical_file lf SET disk_location = regexp_replace (fap.full_access_url, '^file:/+', '/' ) FROM metadata.file_access_point fap WHERE fap.logical_file_id = lf.id AND fap.full_access_url like ('file:/%');
